title: crash when rejoin an already joined community on desktop
body:
# Bug Report

error caused by this line below, trying to get the avatar of the rejoined community, got `nil` from `(first (:name avatar-params))`
https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/blob/ceaa363f087ff825e5d74a9143332b9c834c9a01/src/status_im2/contexts/shell/cards/view.cljs#L133

but it's not the root cause
also, the community is in the pending section instead of joined section in the home screen when the error occurs

error log:

### Reproduction
Got client A, B, C and account ACC1, ACC2
A, ACC1, ios simulator
B, ACC2, another ios simulator
C, ACC1, status desktop

I created a community few weeks ago for testing, it's synced on A and B, not C
I rebuild client A and the community is not synced
So, I send the community invitation from B to A
The invite was synced on both A and C
I then joined the community on client A, did some development
Then joined the community on client C (request join)
Client A crashed



- Status version: develop branch 
- Operating System: iOS
@yqrashawn are these screens in the old ui or the new one?

> @yqrashawn are these screens in the old ui or the new one?

the new one `status_im2.contexts.shell.cards.view.avatar`

![CleanShot 2023-01-12 at 10 54 23](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15090582/211964885-c9d461e5-dc65-43b5-bda4-0207bb393f8a.png)
